DEFINING DATA IN THE CLOUD ERA A Pivotal Strategy Update HEADLINE GOES HERE AND IS ALL CAPS Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
We recently invited you to Pivotal's live streaming event taking place next Tuesday, February 17th. As a valued customer, we would like to extend an exclusive invitation for you to join us in person <http://www.pivotal.io/new-approach-to-big-data-live?utm_source=Pivotal-Email-customers&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=New-Approach-to-Big-Data-live>. Lunch will be provided and you will have opportunity to tour the Pivotal office and see agile development in action!
Event Details: A New Approach to Big Data: Executive Strategy and Product Update <http://www.pivotal.io/new-approach-to-big-data-live?utm_source=Pivotal-Email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=New-Approach-to-Big-Data> Where: Pivotal San Francisco Office When: 11:00AM to 12:30PM (PST). What: Scott Yara, President and Head of Products and Sunny Madra, VP, Data, will unveil Pivotal's groundbreaking new approach and offering that will remove traditional barriers to data-driven innovation. In addition, hear from industry luminaries and customers how these new approaches will accelerate their data and cloud journeys.
Space is limited, so please register today <http://www.pivotal.io/new-approach-to-big-data-live?utm_source=Pivotal-Email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=New-Approach-to-Big-Data> to secure your spot.
Can't attend in person? Register for the live streaming event <http://www.pivotal.io/new-approach-to-big-data?utm_source=Pivotal-Email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=New-Approach-to-Big-Data-in-the-Cloud>.
Regards, The Pivotal Team
